phase.text: I'm so glad you're here! I need your help fixing my generator!

userResponse.option: I want to explore first. I'll help you later.

phase.text: I seem to have misplaced the generator parts around this room! Will you help me find them? Come speak to me if you get stuck!
phase.textOnReturn: Each missing piece goes somewhere on the generator!

phase.text: Of course! Coal in the furnace! Excellent work! Can you find the other pieces?
Brilliant, we're getting there! More pieces are missing though!
phase.textOnReturn: If we had a lever, we could turn the generator on...

phase.text: Hm... I found a riddle when I was searching. "Click five times on green, a secret passage will be seen!" Isn't that candle there green?
EUREKA! A secret passage! Quickly, place that coil on the generator!
Great work... but I think a few pieces are still missing...
I found this super convenient poster earlier, should help you out!
phase.textOnReturn: Try checking the poster I put on the wall!

phase.text: By the power of SCIENCE, I think you've fixed it! Now you just need to turn it on!
Excellent work! Next I'll need your help through that door on the right!
phase.textOnReturn: What are you waiting for? Hurry through the door on the right to continue the experiment!

phase.text: I still need your help! Meet me in that room on the right!
phase.textOnReturn: Please help me out the room to the right.

phase.text: I'll teleport THING up to the roof. Hurry to the roof through that door on the right!
I think those five symbols on the wall above the door appear on those five slime pods on the roof! Perhaps if you tried clicking the pods in that order...
Sorry, but I still need your help in the roof...
BIN-TASTIC job! Have you ever considered a career in SCIENCE? What's that? You want to check out Flem's Vault and get rich instead? Well... okay!
phase.textOnReturn: You'd make an amazing Lab assistant! Come back any time!

phase.text: Oh, someone help! I need a Bin Weevil to help me!
